languages.text: "Не в себе, да... Какой бы ход мы не сделали, он приводит к жертвам. Комморра. Ахиллеас. Эмелина..." {n}Хейнрикс умолкает на несколько секунд.{/n} "Ксавьер. Что он прятал на Ефрате? Что за игры втайне от собственных аколитов?"

traits.locale_text: "Не в себе, да... Какой бы ход мы не сделали, он приводит к жертвам. Комморра. Ахиллеас. Эмилина..." {n}Хейнрикс умолкает на несколько секунд.{/n} "Ксавьер. Что он прятал на Евфрате? Что за игры в тайне от собственных аколитов?"

languages.text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"
languages.original_text: "Не в себе, да... Какой бы ход мы не сделали, он приводит к жертвам. Комморра. Ахиллеас. Эмелина..." {n}Хейнрикс умолкает на несколько секунд.{/n} "Ксавьер. Что он прятал на Ефрате? Что за игры втайне от собственных аколитов?"

traits.locale_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

"Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

"Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

"Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

languages.text: “我失控了，是啊……无论我们怎么做，最终都会让人们受伤。科摩罗、阿吉里亚斯、艾米莉娜……”{n}海因里希沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“希维尔在欧夫拉茨隐瞒了什么？他到底在玩什么样的游戏，就连他自己的侍仆都不知道真相？”
languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

traits.locale_text: “我失控了，是啊……无论我们怎么做，最终都会让人们受伤。科摩罗、阿吉里亚斯、艾米莉娜……”{n}海因里希沉默了几秒钟。{/n}“希维尔在欧夫拉茨隐瞒了什么？他到底在玩什么样的游戏，就连他自己的侍仆都不知道真相？”

languages.text: «A mí no... No importa lo que hagamos, alguien saldrá herido. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina...». {n}Heinrix guarda silencio varios segundos.{/n} «Xavier. ¿Qué ocultaba en Eufrates? ¿A qué jugaba sin que sus acólitos supieran nada?».
languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

traits.locale_text: «A mí no... No importa lo que hagamos, alguien saldrá herido. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina...». {n}Heinrix guarda silencio varios segundos.{/n} «Xavier. ¿Qué ocultaba en Eufrates? ¿A qué jugaba sin que sus acólitos supieran nada?».

languages.text: 「正気を失っている、か…俺が何をしようが関係ないんだ。いずれにせよ、それは人を傷つけることにつながる。コモラフ、アキレアス、エメリナ…」{n}ハインリックスは数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「ザビエル。彼はユーフラテスで何を隠していたのか？自分のアコライトたちが知らないところで、彼はどんなゲームをしていたのだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

traits.locale_text: 「正気を失っている、か…俺が何をしようが関係ないんだ。いずれにせよ、それは人を傷つけることにつながる。コモラフ、アキレアス、エメリナ…」{n}ハインリックスは数秒間沈黙する。{/n}「ザビエル。彼はユーフラテスで何を隠していたのか？自分のアコライトたちが知らないところで、彼はどんなゲームをしていたのだろう？」

languages.text: « Pas moi-même, non... Quel que soit notre prochain coup, des gens vont en souffrir. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina... » {n}Il se tait pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Xavier. Que cachait-il sur Euphrate ? À quel jeu pouvait-il bien jouer au nez et à la barbe de ses propres acolytes ? »
languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

traits.locale_text: « Pas moi-même, non... Quel que soit notre prochain coup, des gens vont en souffrir. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina... » {n}Il se tait pendant quelques instants.{/n} « Xavier. Que cachait-il sur Euphrate ? À quel jeu pouvait-il bien jouer au nez et à la barbe de ses propres acolytes ? »

languages.text: "Nicht ich selbst, nein ... Egal was wir jetzt tun, immer mehr Leute werden dadurch zu Schaden kommen. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina ..." {n}Heinrix verstummt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Xavier. Was hat er auf Eufrates versteckt gehalten? Welches Spiel hat er ohne das Wissen seiner Akolythen gespielt?"
languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht ich selbst, nein ... Egal was wir jetzt tun, immer mehr Leute werden dadurch zu Schaden kommen. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina ..." {n}Heinrix verstummt einige Sekunden.{/n} "Xavier. Was hat er auf Eufrates versteckt gehalten? Welches Spiel hat er ohne das Wissen seiner Akolythen gespielt?"

languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"

languages.text: "Kendimde değilim, evet... Hangi hamleyi yaparsak yapalım sonucunda insanlar inciniyor. Commorragh, Achilleas, Emelina..." {n}Heinrix, birkaç saniyeliğine sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n} "Xavier. Eufrates'te ne saklıyordu? Nasıl bir oyun oynuyor ki hiçbir havarisi bundan haberdar değil?"
languages.original_text: "Not myself, no... No matter what move we make, it will lead to people getting hurt. Commorragh. Achilleas. Emelina..." {n}Heinrix falls silent for several seconds.{/n} "Xavier. What was he hiding on Eufrates? What game was he playing, unbeknownst to his own acolytes?"
